appId.description: Unique ID for an Amplify app.

associatedResources.description: A list of custom resources that are linked to this branch.

backendEnvironmentArn.description: ARN for a backend environment that is part of an Amplify app.

basicAuthCredentials.description: Basic authorization credentials for the branch.

destinationBranch.description: Destination branch if the branch is a pull request branch.

displayName.description: Display name for a branch. This is used as the default domain prefix.

enableAutoBuild.description: Enables auto building for the branch.

enableBasicAuth.description: Enables basic authorization for the branch.

enablePerformanceMode.description: Enables performance mode for the branch.

enablePullRequestPreview.description: Enables pull request previews for this branch.

pullRequestEnvironmentName.description: Amplify environment name for the pull request.

sourceBranch.description: Source branch if the branch is a pull request branch.

stage.description: Describes the current stage for the branch. Valid values: `PRODUCTION`, `BETA`, `DEVELOPMENT`, `EXPERIMENTAL`, `PULL_REQUEST`.

tags.description: Key-value mapping of resource tags. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: Map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

ttl.description: Content Time To Live (TTL) for the website in seconds.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Branch resources.
